paragraphs: At the Prague cinema Kino Aero, the restored film trilogy "The Godfather" directed by Francis Ford Coppola will be shown. Each part will be shown only once - on Mondays, March 21, March 28, and April 4.
The movies will be shown in the director's cut, with the original soundtrack and Czech subtitles. The screening always starts at 8:00 PM. The address of the cinema is Biskupcova 31, Prague 3.
The cost of a single ticket for all three movies is 390 kronor (online purchase here). There is also an option to attend just one part. In this case, the ticket will cost 160 kronor.

All films of the trilogy were restored under Coppola's supervision. Specialists conducted color correction, removed scratches and other film damages. The restoration and re-release are timed to the 50th anniversary of the premiere of the first film - it took place in March 1972.
